title: Hou Yi and the Ten Suns

turns.en: Do you know the story of Hou Yi, the hero who shot down nine suns?
turns.zh: 你知道射下九個太陽的英雄后羿的故事嗎？

turns.en: (Try to say what you know about Hou Yi.)
turns.zh: 試著說說你知道的后羿故事。

turns.en: He used his bow and arrows to save the world.
(Repeat after me: He saved the world.)
turns.zh: 跟著我說：他拯救了世界。

turns.en: This story teaches us courage and responsibility.
turns.zh: 這故事教我們勇氣與責任。
turns.goal: 學習抽象名詞與價值觀
